scripts.convert-nbpt: stbx convert -i Swap-Protocol.PNPRO --one 'Both Parties' --format nbpt -o swap-protocol-both.nbpt.json
scripts.convert-nll: stbx convert -i Swap-Protocol.PNPRO --one 'Both Parties' --format nll -o swap-protocol-both.nll.json
scripts.convert: npm run convert-nbpt && npm run convert-nll
